unnormalised: Hey, great article on athlete biographies! Always inspiring to read about legends like PT Usha and Milkha Singh. Remember "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag"? What a film! More stories on Indian athletes, maybe from IIT sports teams too? I'd love to see one on a Kabaddi champion from Patna, detailing their struggles and wins!
